name: jetleaf_scheduling
desc: JetLeaf Scheduling Library - Comprehensive task scheduling and execution framework.

name: ConcurrentTaskScheduler
desc:
A TaskScheduler implementation that supports concurrent task execution
with configurable concurrency limits and task queue management.

name: ConcurrentTaskScheduler.new
desc:
A TaskScheduler implementation that supports concurrent task execution
with configurable concurrency limits and task queue management.

name: getActiveTaskCount
desc: Returns the number of currently active tasks.

name: getQueuedTaskCount
desc: Returns the number of queued tasks waiting for execution.

name: getTotalTaskCount
desc: Returns the total number of managed tasks.

name: schedule
desc: Schedules a task for execution according to the given trigger.

name: scheduleAtFixedRate
desc: Schedules a task for repeated execution at a fixed rate.

name: scheduleWithFixedDelay
desc: Schedules a task for repeated execution with a fixed delay.

name: shutdown
desc: Shuts down the scheduler, canceling all scheduled tasks.

name: Cron
desc: Defines a cron expression for scheduling the annotated method's execution.

name: Cron.new
desc: Defines a cron expression for scheduling the annotated method's execution.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: expression
desc: A validated cron expression string using the 6-field format.

name: type
desc: A DSL for common cron expressions.

name: zone
desc: The timezone in which the scheduling expression should be evaluated.

name: CronExpression
desc: A strongly typed and runtime-validated representation of a cron expression.

name: CronExpression.new
desc: A strongly typed and runtime-validated representation of a cron expression.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: expression
desc: The cron expression value

name: isValid
desc: Returns whether this cron expression represents a valid schedule

name: nextExecution
desc: Calculates the next execution time after the given reference time in the specified timezone

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CronField
desc: Represents a single field in a cron expression

name: matches
desc: Checks if the given value matches this cron field

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: CronTrigger
desc: Trigger implementation for cron expression-based scheduling.

name: CronTrigger.fromExpression
desc: Creates a trigger from a pre-parsed CronExpression.

name: CronTrigger.new
desc: Trigger implementation for cron expression-based scheduling.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getExpression
desc: Returns the cron expression string used by this trigger.

name: getZone
desc: Returns the timezone in which this trigger operates.

name: nextExecutionTime
desc: Returns the next execution time based on the given context.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: zone
desc: The timezone in which this trigger operates.

name: CronType
desc: Common cron expression presets for scheduling recurring tasks.

name: expression
desc: The cron expression string.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DefaultSchedulingTaskNameGenerator
desc:
Default implementation of SchedulingTaskNameGenerator that creates
structured, hierarchical task names with environment-aware prefixes.

name: DefaultSchedulingTaskNameGenerator.new
desc:
Default implementation of SchedulingTaskNameGenerator that creates
structured, hierarchical task names with environment-aware prefixes.

name: generate
desc: Generates a unique and descriptive name for a scheduled task.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: DefaultTaskExecutionContext
desc:
Default implementation of TaskExecutionContext that provides comprehensive
tracking of task execution history, timing metrics, and exception handling
with full timezone awareness.

name: DefaultTaskExecutionContext.new
desc:
Default implementation of TaskExecutionContext that provides comprehensive
tracking of task execution history, timing metrics, and exception handling
with full timezone awareness.

name: getExecutionCount
desc: Returns the number of times this task has been executed.

name: getLastActualExecutionTime
desc: Returns the last time the task actually started executing.

name: getLastCompletionTime
desc: Returns the last time the task completed execution.

name: getLastException
desc: Returns the exception thrown during the last execution, if any.

name: getLastScheduledExecutionTime
desc: Returns the last time the task was scheduled to execute.

name: recordActualExecution
desc: Records that a task execution has actually started.

name: recordCompletion
desc: Records that a task execution has completed successfully.

name: recordException
desc: Records an exception that occurred during task execution.

name: recordScheduledExecution
desc: Records that a task execution has been scheduled by the scheduler.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: EnableScheduling
desc: Enables scheduled task execution for the application.

name: EnableScheduling.new
desc: Enables scheduled task execution for the application.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

desc: The delay between the completion of one execution and the start of the next.

desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getZone

desc: The invalid cron expression that caused this exception.

desc: Annotation that marks a method to be executed periodically at a fixed rate.

desc: Returns the runtime type of this annotation.

name: period
desc: The fixed time period between the start of each execution.

desc: The timezone in which the scheduling expression should be evaluated.

desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: RunnableScheduledMethod
desc: Adapter that converts a method reflection into a Runnable for scheduling.

name: RunnableScheduledMethod.new
desc: Adapter that converts a method reflection into a Runnable for scheduling.

name: run
desc: Executes the task encapsulated by this instance.

name: RunnableScheduler
desc: A type alias representing a function signature for JetLeaf’s schedulable tasks.

name: RunnableTaskHolder
desc:
A private internal container class used within the JetLeaf scheduling subsystem
to encapsulate a Runnable task along with its associated SchedulingTrigger.

name: RunnableTaskHolder.new
desc:
A private internal container class used within the JetLeaf scheduling subsystem
to encapsulate a Runnable task along with its associated SchedulingTrigger.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Returns the list of properties used to determine equality and hash code.

name: run
desc: Executes the wrapped Runnable’s run method.

name: scheduling
desc: The trigger configuration defining when this task should be executed.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: Scheduled
desc: Schedules the annotated method for periodic execution.

name: Scheduled.new
desc: Schedules the annotated method for periodic execution.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: cron
desc: A cron string expression representing the timing for execution.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: fixedDelay
desc: Executes the method after a fixed delay from the previous call's completion.

name: fixedRate
desc: Executes the method at a constant rate, measured from the start of each call.

name: type
desc: A cron type expression representing the timing for execution.

name: zone
desc: The timezone in which the scheduling expression should be evaluated.

name: ScheduledTask
desc: Represents a scheduled task that can be queried and canceled.

name: cancel
desc: Cancels this scheduled task.

name: getExecutionContext
desc: Returns the execution context for this task.

name: getExecutionCount
desc: Returns the number of times this task has been executed.

name: getIsCanceled
desc: Returns true if this task has been canceled.

name: getIsExecuting
desc: Returns true if this task is currently executing.

name: getLastExecutionTime
desc: Returns the last execution time, or null if not yet executed.

name: getName
desc: Returns the name of this task.

name: getNextExecutionTime
desc: Returns the next scheduled execution time, or null if canceled.

name: getTrigger
desc: Returns the trigger associated with this task.

name: getZone
desc: Returns the timezone in which this task is scheduled.

name: start
desc: Starts the task execution.

name: ScheduledTaskHolder
desc: Interface for components that hold and manage a collection of scheduled tasks.

name: getScheduledTasks
desc: Returns a list of all scheduled tasks managed by this holder.

name: hasScheduledTasks
desc: Returns whether this holder manages any scheduled tasks.

name: SchedulerException
desc: Exception thrown when scheduling operations fail.

name: SchedulerException.new
desc: Exception thrown when scheduling operations fail.

name: SchedulingAnnotationPodProcessor
desc: Core processor that detects and schedules methods annotated with scheduling annotations.

name: MAX_CONCURRENCY_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Environment property name for configuring maximum concurrent task executions.

name: NAME_PREFIX_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Environment property name for configuring task name prefixes.

name: QUEUE_CAPACITY_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Environment property name for configuring task queue capacity.

name: SCHEDULING_ANNOTATION_AWARE_PROCESSOR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for this scheduling annotation processor in the application context.

name: SchedulingAnnotationPodProcessor.new
desc: Core processor that detects and schedules methods annotated with scheduling annotations.

name: TASK_SCHEDULER_POD_NAME
desc: Constants and configuration properties for the scheduling annotation processor.

name: ZONE_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Environment property name for configuring the default scheduling timezone.

name: getOrder
desc: A contract for objects that are assigned an order or precedence value.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getScheduledTasks
desc: Returns a list of all scheduled tasks managed by this holder.

name: hasScheduledTasks
desc: Returns whether this holder manages any scheduled tasks.

name: onApplicationEvent
desc: Handle an application event of type E.

name: onDestroy
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that need to release resources
or perform cleanup when being removed from the container or shut down.

name: onSingletonReady
desc: Callback interface triggered at the end of the singleton pre-instantiation phase.

name: processAfterDestruction
desc: Processes the pod after all destruction callbacks have completed.

name: processAfterInitialization
desc: Processes the pod after all initialization callbacks have completed.

name: processBeforeDestruction
desc: Processes the pod before any destruction callbacks are invoked.

name: requiresDestruction
desc: Determines whether the pod requires destruction processing by this processor.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: supportsEventOf
desc: Returns true if the listener supports the given event.

name: SchedulingConfiguration
desc: Configuration class that sets up the infrastructure for JetLeaf task scheduling.

name: SCHEDULING_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the SchedulingConfiguration.

name: SchedulingConfiguration.new
desc: Configuration class that sets up the infrastructure for JetLeaf task scheduling.

name: schedulingAnnotationProcessor
desc:
Creates the main scheduling annotation processor that detects and registers
methods annotated with @Scheduled and @Cron.

name: SchedulingConfigurer
desc: Interface for programmatically configuring scheduled tasks in the JetLeaf framework.

name: configure
desc: Configures scheduled tasks by registering them with the provided registrar.

name: SchedulingTaskNameGenerator
desc: Generator for creating meaningful and unique task names.

name: generate
desc: Generates a unique and descriptive name for a scheduled task.

name: SchedulingTaskRegistrar
desc:
A core JetLeaf component responsible for discovering, preparing, and registering
scheduled tasks for execution within the framework’s task scheduler.

name: SchedulingTaskRegistrar.new
desc:
A core JetLeaf component responsible for discovering, preparing, and registering
scheduled tasks for execution within the framework’s task scheduler.

name: addCronTask
desc: Registers a cron-based task defined by a RunnableScheduler function.

name: addFixedDelayTask
desc: Registers a fixed-delay task from a RunnableScheduler.

name: addFixedRateTask
desc: Registers a fixed-rate repeating task from a RunnableScheduler.

name: addPeriodicTask
desc: Registers a periodic task using a RunnableScheduler function.

name: addRunnableCronTask
desc: Registers a cron-based task implemented as a Runnable instance.

name: addRunnableFixedDelayTask
desc: Registers a fixed-delay task using a Runnable JetLeaf component.

name: addRunnableFixedRateTask
desc: Registers a fixed-rate repeating task implemented as a Runnable class.

name: addRunnablePeriodicTask
desc: Registers a periodic task implemented as a Runnable component.

name: addRunnableTask
desc: Registers a Runnable instance with a specific Trigger and optional name.

name: addSchedulingTask
desc: Registers a RunnableScheduler function as a scheduled JetLeaf task.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getScheduledTasks
desc: Returns a list of all scheduled tasks managed by this holder.

name: hasScheduledTasks
desc: Returns whether this holder manages any scheduled tasks.

name: hasTasks
desc: Checks whether any runnable tasks have been registered for scheduling.

name: maxConcurrency
desc: Defines the maximum number of tasks JetLeaf’s scheduler may execute concurrently.

name: namePrefix
desc:
An optional prefix applied to automatically generated task names
within JetLeaf’s scheduling subsystem.

name: onDestroy
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that need to release resources
or perform cleanup when being removed from the container or shut down.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: queueCapacity
desc:
The maximum capacity of JetLeaf’s internal task queue before
new tasks are temporarily blocked or rejected.

name: scheduleTask
desc: Attempts to schedule a given RunnableTaskHolder using the current TaskScheduler.

name: scheduler
desc:
The central JetLeaf TaskScheduler instance responsible for executing
registered and resolved tasks.

name: timezone
desc:
The timezone context JetLeaf uses when evaluating time-based Triggers,
such as cron or interval expressions.

name: SchedulingTrigger
desc: A record type representing a JetLeaf scheduling trigger configuration.

name: SimpleScheduledTask
desc: Default implementation of ScheduledTask that manages the complete task execution lifecycle.

desc: Default implementation of ScheduledTask that manages the complete task execution lifecycle.

desc: Cancels this scheduled task.

desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

desc: Returns the next scheduled execution time, or null if canceled.

name: TaskExecutionContext

name: getExecutionCount
desc: Returns the number of times this task has been executed.

desc: Returns the last time the task completed execution.

desc: The name of the task that failed execution.

desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TaskScheduler
desc: Main interface for scheduling and managing asynchronous tasks.

name: schedule
desc: Schedules a task for execution according to the given trigger.

name: scheduleAtFixedRate
desc: Schedules a task for repeated execution at a fixed rate.

name: scheduleWithFixedDelay
desc: Schedules a task for repeated execution with a fixed delay.

name: shutdown
desc: Shuts down the scheduler, canceling all scheduled tasks.

name: Trigger
desc: Determines the next execution time for a scheduled task.

name: getZone
desc: Returns the timezone in which this trigger operates.

name: nextExecutionTime
desc: Returns the next execution time based on the given context.

name: TriggerBuilder
desc:
A builder class that simplifies the creation of various trigger types
with a unified, fluent interface.

name: TriggerBuilder.new
desc:
A builder class that simplifies the creation of various trigger types
with a unified, fluent interface.

name: delayPeriod
desc: The initial delay before the first execution.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: expression
desc: The cron expression for time-based scheduling.

name: fixedDelay
desc: The fixed delay duration between task executions (end to start).

name: fixedRate
desc: The fixed rate duration between task executions (start to start).

name: getTrigger
desc: Returns the underlying trigger instance created by this builder.

name: getZone
desc: Returns the timezone in which this trigger operates.

desc: Returns the next execution time based on the given context.

desc: The simple period for recurring execution.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this trigger builder.

name: unawaited
desc: Helper function to prevent warning for unawaited futures.
